ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Quadrilateral Security Dialogue
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To ensure and sustain an open, free and prosperous Indo-Pacific region.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Non-Aligned Movement
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To ensure the national independence, sovereignty, territorial integrity and security of non-aligned countries.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Group of Seven
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To discuss and deliberate on international economic and monetary issues.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Group of 15
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To foster cooperation and provide input for other international groups, such as the World Trade Organization and the Group of Seven.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Group of 77
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To provide the means for the countries of the South to articulate and promote their collective economic interests.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Group of 24
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To coordinate the positions of developing countries on monetary and development finance issues.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: G20
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To discuss policy pertaining to the promotion of international financial stability.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Alliance of Small Island States
ideological_and_political_groupings.type: Coalition of Small Island and Low-lying Coastal Countries
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To amplify the voices of small island developing states (SIDS) in United Nations processes.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: BRICS
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To encourage commercial, political, and cultural cooperation between its members.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Bolivarian Alliance for the Americas
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To promote social, political, and economic integration in Latin America and the Caribbean.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Association of World Election Bodies
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To promote and support sustainable democracy through election management bodies.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: New Agenda Coalition
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To promote nuclear disarmament and non-proliferation.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Non-Proliferation and Disarmament Initiative
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To advance the implementation of non-proliferation and disarmament commitments and objectives.

ideological_and_political_groupings.name: Western European and Others Group
ideological_and_political_groupings.purpose: To provide a forum for coordination and exchange of information on UN-related issues.
